func.name: commands
func.summary: List all available command of this program.

func.name: help
func.summary: Search data on the Okapi XML Document and show this help window, if something is found.

item.description: Name of the function to be searched on the Okapi Help System.

func.name: list
func.summary: List all current created tables, and its dimensions.

func.name: magplot
func.summary: Plot the given table with the given type and parameters.

item.description: Specify which table will be plotted.
Specify the scheme of the plotting. May be "dot", "line", "box", "pie" and "bar".
Manually sets up the limits of the x-axis. Should be on format (x,y), with no spaces inside.
Manually sets up the limits of the y-axis. Should be on format (x,y), with no spaces inside.
Set up the label of the x-axis.
Set up the label of the y-axis.

func.name: matrix
func.summary: Make a classic matrix operation with two given tables, and show its result.

item.description: The desired operation. May be "add", "sub" or "mult".
Specify the operation to execute. Can be "create", "addrow", "addcol", "addemptyrow", "addemptycol", "remrow", "remcol", "remlastcol", "remlastrow", "colname", "rowname" and "print".
Specify the name of the table, which one the operation will be executed on.
Number of rows on this table.
Number of columns on this table.
Source file, where the values will be searched on to fill the table.
